文化是权利，是资源，是创造力；对少数民族而言，文化尤为如此。这里是少数民族文化发展合作平台，敬请参与。

Civil Society Empowerment in China: Guaranteeing and Developing Cultural Rights of Ethnic Minorities.

如何可持续地保护和发展少数民族文化权益？如何使公众便于并乐于参与保护和发展少数民族文化权益？CHP 在此前工作的基础上发起设立了这个专项合作平台。

How do we sustainably protect and develop the cultural rights of ethnic minorities? How do we encourage the public to conveniently and willingly participate in this cause? CHP established this specialized cooperative platform based on foundations built from previous experiences.

2014-05-19  马戎：我必须不断重申要反对大汉民族意识
咨询与合作 Get Involved
更多 More

任何机构，任何个人，只要您有志于保护和发展少数民族文化权益，或者对少数民族文化发展有所兴趣，就能够在弥诺平台上，发现机会，发挥作用，得到合作，实现价值。

Any individual or organization interested in protecting and developing the cultural rights of ethnic minorities, or interested in their cultural development, will be able to discover project opportunities, connect with collaborators, contribute and make a difference through the CHPMinority platform.
